00038 #define DZ_SCRIPT_FILE_IDENTIFIER   "DAZS"
00039 
00040 // This flag will be set if the file has been encrypted.
00041 #define DZ_FILE_IS_ENCRYPTED        0x00000001
00042 #define DZ_FILE_HAS_PRODUCT_ID      0x00000002
00043 #define DZ_FILE_IS_BETA_CONTENT     0x10000000
00044 
00045 // These are reserved section ID's used to indicate the start of a pointer definition
00046 #define DZ_FILE_POINTER_SECTION         0x00f0
00047 #define DZ_FILE_STORABLE_SECTION        0x00f1
00048 #define DZ_FILE_POINTER_REF_SECTION     0x00f2
00049 #define DZ_FILE_STORABLE_REF_SECTION    0x00f3
